hero.title: Discover <highlight>expert care</highlight> to enhance your natural beauty and restore confidence.
hero.description:
ROOP PLASTIC SURGERY CLINIQUE AND INFERTILITY COUNSELLING CENTRE
Personalized treatments in cosmetic surgery, skin, and hair restoration, focused on advanced techniques, safety, and natural-looking results.

services.title: What We Offer
services.description: Advanced procedures in cosmetic surgery, skin rejuvenation, and hair restoration, all under one roof.

redefining.title: Redefining Beauty, Restoring <highlight>Confidence</highlight>
redefining.description: At Roop, we combine artistry and advanced medical expertise to help you achieve results that look natural, feel authentic, and enhance your true self.

specialists.title: Meet Our Specialists
specialists.description: Experienced professionals dedicated to your care and well-being.

drRaunak.name: Dr. Raunak Shinde
drRaunak.description: Board-Certified Plastic and Cosmetic Surgeon with Expertise in Aesthetic Surgery.

drRaunak.name: Dr. Raunak Shinde
drRaunak.tagline: Board-Certified Plastic and Cosmetic Surgeon with Expertise in Aesthetic Surgery.
drRaunak.intro1: As the Director of Roop Plastic Surgery Clinique and Infertility Counselling Centre in Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh, Dr. Shinde has delivered exceptional plastic surgery services for over 7 years.
drRaunak.intro2: Dr. Shinde has completed prestigious aesthetic fellowships and reconstructive observerships at renowned centers.
drRaunak.expertiseDescription: Dr. Raunak Shinde specializes in advanced procedures that enhance beauty with natural results.
drRaunak.qualification1: IAAPS Recognised Fellowship in Aesthetic Surgery, Tamira Plastic Surgery Centre, Chennai
drRaunak.qualification3: M.S. (Master Of Surgery) General Surgery (IPGMER), Kolkata
drRaunak.qualification4: M.B.B.S. Seth G.S. Medical College & King Edward VII Memorial Hospital, Mumbai
drRaunak.personalizedCareDescription: With over 13 years of surgical expertise, Dr. Shinde combines advanced training with a compassionate approach, ensuring tailored treatments and natural results for every patient.

drKavisha.name: Dr. Kavisha Shinde
drKavisha.intro: I aspire to be a competent and ethical Practitioner and cultivate expertise in areas specific to the realm of Infertility. I believe in the continuum of education and learning while giving my dedicated input and sincere contribution in the work place as an individual and as part of the team.
drKavisha.expertiseDescription: Focused on ethical care and infertility treatment with compassion and expertise.
drKavisha.experience1: Registrar – CK Birla Hospital , CMRI, Kolkata
drKavisha.experience3: Gynaecologist – National Health Mission, U.T., Chandigarh
drKavisha.experience4: Senior Resident – Govt. Medical College & Hospital, Chandigarh
drKavisha.qualification1: MS (Obstetrics & Gynaecology), Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Medical College, Indore.
drKavisha.qualification2: Thesis: Comparative study of induction of labour with mechanical dilatation vs misoprostol (conducted at MGM Medical College, Indore).
drKavisha.qualification3: MBBS, Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Medical College, Indore.
drKavisha.qualification4: Focus: postgraduate specialization in obstetrics & gynaecology with research experience in labour induction methods.
drKavisha.course1: Fellowship in Infertility - Diploma in Clinical ART – Amity University & Indian Fertility Society- At Wing's Hospital, Ahmedabad
drKavisha.course2: Laparoscopy Training, Marigold Women's Hospital, Ahmedabad
drKavisha.course3: FOGSI Ultrasound Training Programme, Rajni Fetal Medicine Center, Ahmedabad
drKavisha.course4: Training Course in Infertility, Institute of Reproductive Medicine, Kolkata
